ygData.messageBody:
Hi, I'm the gnome that posted the book. I would first
like to apologize for not being forthwith enough to
post my name in game or out as I've been somewhat
stalked by upset tinkerers of Norath and wish not to
be pursude further. Recently I was going through my
links and popped on to the old bookmark I had of the
tinkering site that I posted the book to (as it seemed
the most active). I've had the book in my posession
since the first month of relese, and felt totally bad
for you all seeing you bust your ass just for
something I wrote off so long ago as useless (yeah I
came to the same conclusions of all of you for
fireworks ;0). As for the burning question you all
have on the location of the book, just let me say,
don't stress yourselves just goto the web page and get
the recipes from there.

As for some of the rumors I've read on this thread
about an even more infamous 4th book, I would like end
these rumors now. This book as of right now is not,
repeat not in the game. The recipes are working (if
you can figure them out) but they are not in a book
that is currently available in the game. I have that
information directly from verant staff. You all have
all the books are recipes that are currently
available.

Some items of interest that I have noticed in Akanon,
there is a larger than normal clockwork spider on the
ramparts as you enter the city on the top level. This
clockwork is blue to a level 50! Someone go kill it
cuz I'm almost KOS in akanon due to killing all the
named spawns in steamfont (I carry gnome heads around
for luck ;0).

The Pimp'n fresh gnome of CT

=====
